title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: After some discussion, the projectile, called the _Annihilator_, from
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the fact that it annihilated space, was begun. It was two hundred feet
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: long, ten feet in diameter in the middle, and shaped like a cigar. It
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: consisted of a double shell of strong metal, with a non-conducting gas
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: between the two sides.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Within it were various machines, besides the Etherium motor, which
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: would send the projectile along at the rate of one hundred miles a
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: second. This great speed was necessary in order to reach the planet
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mars, which, at the time our friends started for it, was about
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: thirty-five millions of miles away from this earth. It has since
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: receded some distance farther than this.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Finally all was in readiness for the start to Mars. Professor Roumann
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wanted to prove that the planet was inhabited, and he also wanted to
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: get some of a peculiar substance, which he believed gave the planet its
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rosy hue. He had an idea that it would prove of great value.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But, though every precaution was taken, the adventurers were not to get
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: away from the earth safely. Almost at the last minute, a crazy
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: machinist, named Fred Axtell, who was refused work on the projectile,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: tried to blow it up with a bomb. He partly succeeded, but the damage
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was repaired, and the start made.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Inside the projectile our friends shut themselves up, and the powerful
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: motors were started. Off it shot, at the rate of one hundred miles a
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: second, but the travellers were as comfortable as in a Pullman car.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They had plenty to eat and drink, they manufactured their own air and
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: water, and they slept when they so desired.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But Axtell, the crazy machinist, had hidden himself aboard, and, in
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mid-air, he tried to wreck the projectile. He was caught, and locked up
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in a spare room, but, when Mars was reached, he escaped.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The book tells how our friends were welcomed by the Martians, how they
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: learned the language, saw many strange sights, and finally got on the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: track of the Cardite, or red substance, which the German professor, Mr.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roumann, had come so far to seek. This Cardite was capable of great
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: force, and, properly controlled, could move great weights and operate
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: powerful machinery.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Our friends wanted to take some back to earth with them, but when they
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: attempted to store it in their projectile, they met with objections,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for the Martians did not want them to take any. They had considerable
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: trouble, and the crazy machinist led an attack of the soldiers of the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: red planet against our friends, the adventurers in the projectile.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Among the other curiosities brought away by our friends, was a
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: newspaper printed in Mars, for the inhabitants of that place where much
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: further advanced along certain lines than we are on this earth, but in
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the matter of newspapers they had little to boast of, save that the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sheets were printed by wireless electricity, no presses being needed.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As told at the opening of this story, Jack had noticed on one of the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: made shortly before our friends made their hasty departure, and it was
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: undertaken by some Martian adventurers on another part of the red
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: planet than where the projectile landed, and so Professor Henderson and
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his friends did not hear of it at the time.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, then, suppose we make the attempt to go to the moon," said
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: not take long to get ready."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: It was an anxious assemblage that gathered inside the big shed the next
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: day, to watch Professor Roumann try the Cardite motor. Would it work as
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: well as had the Etherium one? Would it send them along through space at
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: enormous speed? True, they would not have to travel so far, nor so
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fast, but more power would be needed, since, as it was feared no food,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: water, nor air could be had on the moon, many more supplies were to be
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: taken along than on the trip to Mars, and this made the projectile
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: heavier.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: to the Preakness house, and about a mile away from it. "We'll soon be
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he uttered a startled cry.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: happened it knocked it out of my mind, I guess. I stuck the telegram in
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: go at once. The professor won't like it."

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Say, Mark, there's no use of both of us going to the telegraph office.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: see if that strange man appears on the scene. I'll not be long, and you
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: may develop."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: just before you reach the Preakness grounds."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all day, and there isn't anything that needs to be done at home, or
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: around the projectile, so take your time."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: solve the mystery of the man who writes such queer notes."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack started off across the fields at a swift pace, while Mark strolled
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on down the road, in the direction of the old Preakness house. He was
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they got to it.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bend in the road.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why didn't you come home?" asked Mr. Henderson.

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Oh, I didn't want to make any trouble and delay work on the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: to let you know where I was. But I'm all right now."

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: early, for at the last moment many little details needed to be settled.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: than ever, and his features were almost hidden. He still wore his arm
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, how do you feel?" asked Jack, looking narrowly at the figure. He
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: could not get rid of a suspicion that something was wrong with Mark.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Oh, I'm feeling pretty fair," was the mumbled answer. "I didn't sleep

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: much, though."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well, take care of yourself," advised Jack. "We are about ready to
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: start. We'll get off about noon, Professor Henderson says. Don't try to
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: do anything and injure your broken arm. You certainly had a tough time
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of it."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "You don't need to. We're all but finished. Just hang around and watch
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: me work. There isn't much to do."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well," remarked Professor Roumann, after a final inspection of the big
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: moon--"I think we are about ready to leave this earth. How about it,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: Professor Henderson?"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Yes, I think so. Have you made any calculation as to speed?"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Yes, we will not have to move nearly as fast as we did when we went to
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: "I have fixed you," the letter began. "You will never get to the moon.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: I shall have my revenge. You took my brother Fred Axtell to Mars and
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: left him there. I determined to get him back, and to that end I
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: disguised myself as one of the boys, and got aboard. When we were
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: freedom.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Now, if we could only blast out a loaf of bread, we'd be all right,"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Spurred on by an overwhelming thirst, they wandered about the dead
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: city, but found no moisture. They tried to chew some of the pale green
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: some juice in it.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They crossed the city, and wandered out into the country beyond. It
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: appeared to have been a fertile land before the stone death settled
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: down on it. They saw farmers in the fields, turned into images, beside
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the oxen with which they had been plowing. But nowhere was there a sign
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As it was, they dragged out a miserable existence, eating from time to
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: time of the blasted meat. But even this palled on them after a while,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in their mouths.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Go out and look for water. There must be some in the country outside
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: if there isn't any in this city. I'm going to have a look. Besides, if
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: sit here in this dreadful place and give up."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: about."

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: This was a new danger, and, thinking of it, the faces of the boys
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: became graver than ever. Death seemed bound to get them somehow.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Two more days went by. They had now been lost on the moon over a week.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Each one now noticed that his life-torch was weakening. How much longer
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: would they last? They dared not answer that question. They could only
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hope.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The sun, too, was moving away from them. Soon the long night would set
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in. By Mark's computation there was only three more days of daylight
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: left. What would happen in the desolate darkness?
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As they were returning from the black pool, with their water bottles
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: filled, and put inside the fur bags to prevent the frost from reaching
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them, Mark happened to gaze over across a line of towering peaks. What
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he saw caused him to gasp in astonishment.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Jack! Andy! See!" he whispered hoarsely, pointing a trembling finger
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: at the sky.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: There, outlined against the cloudless heavens, was a long, black shape,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: floating through the air about two miles distant.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The projectile! The _Annihilator!_" yelled Jack. "Shout! Call to them!
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Wave your hands! Andy, fire your gun! They have started off, and they
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: can't see us. We must make them hear!"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Together they raised their voices in a mighty shout. The old hunter
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fired his gun several times. They waved their hands frantically.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the projectile never swerved from its course. On it moved slowly,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: those in it paying no heed to the wanderers, for they did not hear
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them. Andy fired his gun again, but the signal failed, and a few
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: minutes later the _Annihilator_ was lost to sight behind a great peak.

text: THE FIELD OF DIAMONDS
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Dumbly the wanderers gazed at each other. They could not comprehend it
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: at first. That the projectile, on which their very lives depended in
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this dead world of the moon, should float away and leave them seemed
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: incredible. Yet they had witnessed it.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Do--do you really think we saw it--saw the _Annihilator_, Mark?" asked
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack in a low voice, after several minutes had passed.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Saw it? Of course, we saw it. We've seen the last of it, I'm afraid.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But what do you mean?"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I--I thought maybe I was out of my head, and I only saw a vision,"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: answered Jack. "You know--a sort of mirage. It was real, then?"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Altogether too real," spoke Andy Sudds grimly. "They didn't see us nor
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hear us. We're left behind!"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But can't we do something?" demanded Mark. "Let's start off and try to
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: catch them. They were going slow."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The wonder to me is how they moved at all," said Jack. "I thought the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: machinery wouldn't work until we got back with the lost tool."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Probably the two professors found some way of patching up the motor,"
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was Mark's opinion, and later they found that this was so.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: For some time they remained staring in the direction in which the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: projectile had vanished, as if they might see it reappear, but the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: great steel shell did not poke its sharp nose in among the towering
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: peaks which hid it from view. Probably it was many miles away now.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Well," remarked old Andy at length, "we've got to make the best of it.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: We won't have many more days of light, and we must gather what food we
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: can, put it where we can find it in the dark, and also bring in some
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: water from the black pool. We can store that in some of the stone
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: tables. By turning them upside down they will make good troughs, and it
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: won't freeze. We must work while we have light, for soon the long night
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: will come."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The sight of the projectile going away seemed to take the heart out of
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all of them, and they did not know what to do. For some time they
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: remained there idly, until Andy roused the boys to a sense of their
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: responsibility by urging upon them the necessity of getting together a
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: store of meat and water.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As they had about exhausted the limited food supply in the ancient
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: restaurant, they sought and found another and larger one. There they
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had the good fortune to come upon some whole sides of beef and lamb,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which were petrified on the outside, but which, when they had blasted
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: off the outer shell of stone, gave them good food.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They made several trips to the black pool, and brought in all the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: liquid they could, for they did not want to have to go outside the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: petrified city into the wild and desolate country beyond, after the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dismal night had settled down. They feared they would become lost again.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Their lonely situation seemed to grow upon them. The appalling silence
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all about terrified them. The weird sight of the petrified men and
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: women in the petrified city got on their nerves.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They had done all they could. A store of meat had been blasted out and
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: put away. It would keep outside of the stone shell now, for the weather
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was getting colder with the advent of the long night.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: This fact worried them. With the temperature at twenty-eight when the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sun was shining, what might it not fall to in the darkness? The
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: terrible cold of the arctic regions might be nothing compared to the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: frostiness of the dead moon in the shadow. Their fur garments, thick as
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they were, might be no more protection than so much paper. And they had
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: no means of making a fire, nor anything to burn on one had they been
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: capable of kindling it, for Andy had used the last of his cartridges to
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: blast with, and where everything was petrified there was no wood.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Then, too, their life-torches were giving out. The emanations of oxygen
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were weaker, and they had to hold them almost under their noses to
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: breathe the vital vapor.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: One day, or rather what corresponded to a day, for they had lost all
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: track of time, Andy Sudds arose from the stone bench on which their
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: meager meal had been served. He started from the restaurant where they
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had taken up their abode.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Where are you going?" asked Jack.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I'm going to make one last attempt to find the projectile before it
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: gets too dark," answered the hunter. "We can go out, look around for
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: several hours, and get back before darkness sets in. We might as well
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: do it as sit here doing nothing. Then, too, we can bring in some more
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: water. We'll need all we can store away."
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I'll go with you," volunteered Jack, and Mark, not wanting to be left
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: alone in the dead city, followed. Carrying their life-torches and
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wrapping their fur garments closely about them, for it had grown much
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: colder, they sallied forth.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They found a thin film of ice on the black pool, showing that it would
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: probably freeze when it got cold enough, though the ordinary
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: temperature of thirty-two degrees had not affected it. They filled
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their water bottles, and then Andy proposed that they take a new
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: path--one they had not tried before.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They hardly knew where they were going, but ever as they tramped on
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they cast anxious looks upward to see if they might descry the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: projectile hovering over them. But they did not see it.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack had taken the lead, and was walking along, glancing idly about. He
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: came to a place where two peaks were so close together that it was all
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he could do to squeeze through. But the moment he had passed the defile
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and looked out on a broad, level field, he came to a sudden stop. His
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: murmured: "It can't be true! It can't be true!"

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What?" called Mark.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that the men of Mars discovered! There are the diamonds--millions of
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them!"

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: beside Jack. Before him in the fading light of the sun was a broad
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: field, girt around with towering cliffs, and the surface of the field
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: through his fingers in a sparkling stream. Old Andy came up to the boys.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They're only glass or crystals," he said.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: of gems. "I should say they were diamonds, probably meteoric diamonds,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

text: making a little heap of the stones.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: At any other time the discovery of such a vast store of wealth would
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: have set the wanderers half wild with joy. Now they only accepted the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fact dully, for the perils of their situation overburdened them. As
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack had said, they needed food more than the gems, for at best the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: supply they had blasted out could not last long, and when that was gone
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: where were they to get more, for there were no more cartridges, and the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rending force of powder was needed to open the rocky meat.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I knew we'd find the diamonds," murmured Jack, as he began to fill the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pockets of his fur coat. "I'm right, after all, Mark, you see."

text: The moon voyagers had a great store of gems, and, as they did not wish
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to bring down values by disposing of them, they only sold a few, which,
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: because of their great size and brilliancy, brought a large price.
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Several jewelers wanted to know where the diamonds came from, but the
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: secret was well kept. Most of the gems were used for scientific
title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: purposes, but Mark and Jack gave some to certain of their friends.

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds

title: Lost on the Moon; Or, in Quest of the Field of Diamonds
